name: Handsfree.js
shortDescription: Quickly integrate face, hand, and/or pose tracking to your frontend projects in a snap. Comes with a plugin system for easily toggling models/functionality, a gesture mapper for hands, and a browser extensions starter kit
longDescription: Quickly integrate face, hand, and/or pose tracking to your frontend projects in a snap. Comes with a plugin system for easily toggling models/functionality, a gesture mapper for hands, and a browser extensions starter kit
